reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Promoting Mexico's low carbon energy sector through the application of methodologies and tools.

description.narrative: To mobilise investment and research capacity in clean technologies in Mexico by supporting the Mexican Ministry of Energy (SENER) and the Mexican Centres of Innovation and Energy (CEMIEs) to create a suite of methodological tools. This will allow them to engage effectively with the private sector, prioritise technology-level initiatives and unlock green growth and sustainable development for Mexico through low carbon innovation. The programme will complement the roadmaps currently being prepared by the Mexican Institute of Petroleum and will open up opportunities for UK technology and research to enter the Mexican market.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
